Chinese.name: Ckafka简单消息输出模板
Chinese.description: 本示例会根据触发器配置的最大批量消息数去触发云函数运行，云函数每次运行都会输出消息文本。
Chinese.attention: 在使用本示例代码时需要在函数里修改用户的appid、secret_id、secret_key、bucket名。

English.name: CkafkaTriggerTemplate
English.description: This demo will connect Ckafca and consume message automatically. The SCF will print the msg.
English.attention: Please change the appid,secret_id,secret_key,bucket name and region before you use it.
